verses.plain: I cried unto the LORD with my voice; with my voice unto the LORD did I make my supplication.

tokens.t: with my voice; with my voice unto the

verses.plain: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.

tokens.t: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.

verses.plain: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.

tokens.t: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.

verses.plain: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.

tokens.t: no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.

verses.plain: I cried unto thee, O LORD: I said, Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living.

tokens.t: my portion in the land of the living.

verses.plain: Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.

tokens.t: Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.

verses.plain: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.

tokens.t: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.

footnotes.text: Maschil…: or, A Psalm of David, giving instruction
I looked…: or, Look on the right hand, and see
